snippet: Over the past few Olympics, NBC has shown more live coverage over the Internet than it has on TV. For the upcoming Winter Games, Comcast's Xfinity TV subscribers will be able to tap the breadth of that online coverage on their big screens....

headline.print_headline: Comcast to Bring Online Olympics Coverage to TV
headline.main: Comcast to Bring Online Olympics Coverage to TV

lead_paragraph: Over the past few Olympics, NBC has shown more live coverage over the Internet than it has on TV. For the upcoming Winter Games, Comcast's Xfinity TV subscribers will be able to tap the breadth of that online coverage on their big screens.
